scripts.postbuild: clear-package-json package.json -o build/package.json --fields scripts && cp .npmignore build && cp LICENSE.md build && cp README.md build
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run docs && npm run postbuild
scripts.release: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd build && npm pack
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && npm publish
